General.Name: Intek Group S.p.A
General.Description: KME Group S.p.A. produces and sells copper and copper alloy semifinished products in Europe. It is also involved in the renewable energy, private equity, and other services. The company was formerly known as Intek Group S.p.A. and changed its name to KME Group S.p.A. in September 2022. KME Group S.p.A. was founded in 1886 and is based in Milan, Italy.
